text:
Use this exact prompt in GitHub Copilot to add two features to the frontend

Feature one
Fix the textarea full page layout so large text scrolls inside the box and never disappears behind the outline or page footer

Feature two
Add a theme toggle at the top right to switch between dark and light theme and remember the choice across reloads

Apply changes to these files only
web/index.html
web/view.html
web/style.css
web/app.js

Requirements for the generator

Make minimal changes to existing markup and scripts

Keep styles small and use CSS variables for colors

Use a top right button labeled Theme to toggle

Persist theme selection in localStorage key pasteTheme

Ensure textarea uses box sizing border box and its height is computed so it does not overflow past the visible container

Textarea must scroll internally when content exceeds visible area

Provide smooth transition between themes

Do not add any external libraries

Ensure mobile friendly layout and keyboard usability

Exact tasks to implement

A. HTML changes for index and view pages

Add a header element at the top with two items
a. Left aligned title element Minimal Paste Service unchanged
b. Right aligned button with id themeToggle and text Theme

Wrap the large textarea and the Go button in a main container with class editorContainer so CSS can size it

Ensure textarea has id pasteInput and the Go button has id goButton so existing JS continues to work

B. CSS changes in web slash style dot css

Define CSS variables under :root for the light theme and inside body dot darkTheme override them for dark mode
Example variables
colorBackground
colorSurface
colorText
colorAccent
colorBorder

Set global styles
box sizing border box on all elements
use system stack font family

Header styling
fixed or sticky top header with height 64px full width and internal padding
title left and theme button right aligned with gap

Editor container sizing
place below the header
compute height using calc so it fills available viewport space
For example height calc 100vh minus 64px minus 48px where 64px is header height and 48px is footer area if any
use overflow hidden on the container

Textarea specific rules
width 100 percent minus container padding
height 100 percent of container minus Go button area using flex layout
set resize none
overflow auto so long text scrolls inside the textarea
set padding large enough so text does not touch the outline
border radius and border using colorBorder variable

Go bu
